7: 1 She has been speaking on the phone for more than three hours. (Who?)
1 Who has been speaking on the phone for more than three hours?
2 She was making tea when her brother came home. (What?)
2 What was she making when her brother came home?
3 We will go to Minsk in September. (Where?)
3 Where will we go in September?
4 They were good doctors. (Who?)
4 Who were good doctors?
5 He has just had dinner. (When?)
5 When did he have dinner?
6 He heard him singing yesterday. (When?)
6 When did he hear him singing?
7 We have been invited to the party. (Who?)
7 Who has been invited to the party?
8 There was something unusual in this person. (What?)
8 What was unusual in this person?
9 She won't call him ever again. (When?)
9 When will she call him?
10 I couldn't lift that heavy box. (What?)
10 What couldn't you lift?
11 We bought this dress at the market. (Where?)
11 Where did we buy this dress?
12 You are being called. (Who?)
12 Who is being called?
13 My friend saw you crossing the street yesterday. (Who?)
13 Who saw you crossing the street yesterday?
14 He is easy to deal with. (Who?)
14 Who is easy to deal with?
